sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Back to Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.10 Form and Time of Elections.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless otherwise specified herein, each election required or permitted to be made by any Participant or other person entitled to benefits under the Plan, and any permitted modification or revocation thereof, shall be in writing filed with the applicable Committee at such times, in such form, and subject to such restrictions and limitations, not inconsistent with the terms of the Plan, as the Committee shall require.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.11 Foreign Jurisdictions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding any other provisions of the Plan to the contrary, in order to foster and promote achievement of the purposes of the Plan or to comply with provisions of laws and customary business practices in other countries in which the Company or any Subsidiary operates or has employees, the Committee shall have the power and authority to
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) determine which Participants employed outside the United States or subject to non-United States tax laws are eligible to participate in the Plan,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) modify the terms and conditions of Awards granted to or held by such Participants,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) establish subplans, modify exercise procedures and other terms and procedures relating to Awards granted or held by such Participants to the extent such actions may be necessary or advisable, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) take such other actions as the Committee may deem necessary or appropriate so that the value and other benefits of an Award to such a Participant, as affected by foreign tax laws and other applicable restrictions, shall be comparable to the value of such an Award to a Participant who is resident or employed in the United States.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An Award may be modified under this subsection 9.11 in a manner that is inconsistent with the express terms of the Plan, so long as such modifications will not contravene any applicable law or regulation or result in actual liability under Section 16(b) of the Exchange Act for the Participant whose Award is modified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The foregoing provisions of this subsection 9.11 shall not be applied to increase the share limitations of subsection 4.1 or to otherwise change any provision of the Plan that would otherwise require the approval of the Companys stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.12 Severability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any provision of this Plan is held illegal or invalid for any reason, the illegality or invalidity shall not affect the remaining provisions, and the Plan shall be construed and administered as if the illegal or invalid provision had not been included.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.13 Governing Law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Plan and all Award Agreements shall be governed in accordance with the laws of the State of Illinois; provided, however that, Delaware law shall apply to the extent applicable to the issuance of Common Stock or other corporate law matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.14 Action by the Company or Subsidiary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any action required or permitted to be taken by the Company or any Subsidiary shall be by resolution of its board of directors or governing body or by action of one or more members of the board or governing body (including a committee of the board or governing body) who are duly authorized to act for the board or, in the case of any Subsidiary that is a partnership, by action of its general partner or a person or persons authorized by the general partner, or (except to the extent prohibited by applicable law or the rules of any stock exchange on which the Common Stock is listed) by a duly authorized officer of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.15 Gender and Number.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where the context admits, words in any gender shall include any other gender, words in the singular shall include the plural and the plural shall include the singular.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9.16 Amendment and Termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board may, at any time, amend, suspend or terminate the Plan, and the Board or the Committee may amend any Agreement, provided that no amendment or termination may, in the absence of written consent to the change by the affected Participant (or, if the Participant is not then living, the affected beneficiary), adversely affect the rights of any Participant or beneficiary under any Award granted under the Plan prior to the date such amendment is adopted by the Board (or the Committee, if applicable); provided, however, that adjustments pursuant to subsection 4.2 shall not be subject to the foregoing limitations of this subsection 9.16.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Companys stockholders shall be required to approve
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) any amendment that would materially increase the number of shares of Common Stock for which Awards may be granted or that would increase the number of shares of Common Stock for which ISOs may be granted,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) any amendment to subsection 6.8 (relating to Option and SAR repricing),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) any amendment to the limitations set forth in subsection 4.1(h),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d) any changes to the Performance Criteria to the extent applicable to Awards intended to constitute Performance-Based Compensation, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (e) any change for which such approval is required by law or the rules of any stock exchange on which the Common Stock is listed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the intention of the Company that, to the extent that any provisions of this Plan or any Awards granted hereunder are subject to Code Section 409A, the Plan and the Awards comply with the requirements of Code Section 409A and that the Board shall have the authority to amend the Plan as it deems necessary or desirable to conform to Code Section 409A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Company does not guarantee that Awards under the Plan will comply with Code Section 409A and the Committee is under no obligation to make any changes to any Award to cause such compliance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
